## Description {#details}

This class can be used to assign names to VPValues.

For VPValues without underlying value, assign consecutive numbers and use those as names (wrapped in vp&lt;&gt;). Otherwise, use the name from the underlying value (wrapped in ir&lt;&gt;), appending a .V version number if there are multiple uses of the same name. Allows querying names for VPValues for printing, similar to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduleslottracker">ModuleSlotTracker</a> for IR values.

Definition at line 447 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanvalue-h">VPlanValue.h</a>.
